post:
<center><img src=https://anynode.net/asset/images/logo.png /></center>

Hey guys, Sam here from anyNode.net to offer you guys some discounts on our standard VPS packages. Our current VPS offerings are OpenVZ 2.6.32 based. All of our plans include vSwap and are capable of running the latest versions of all mainstream distros. The nodes are equipped with dual Intel Xeon L5520s, 36GB of DDR3, and 4 3TB disks in RAID10. Servers are located at 123.NET in Southfield, MI. Plans are as follows:

**VZ-128**   
128MB Dedicated RAM   
64MB vSwap  
15GB Dedicated Storage  
250GB Bandwidth  
100Mbps Connection  
1 IPv4 Address  
$15.00 per year  
**[Order Now - Detroit](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=7)**  
  
**VZ-256**   
256MB Dedicated RAM  
128MB vSwap   
20GB Dedicated Storage   
500GB Bandwidth  
100Mbps Connection  
1 IPv4 Address  
**PROMOCODE: LET256**   
<del>$4.00</del> $3.00 per month   
**[Order Now - Detroit](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)**   
  
**VZ-512**   
512MB Dedicated RAM    
256MB vSwap  
40GB Dedicated Storage  
1TB Bandwidth  
100Mbps Connection  
1 IPv4 Address  
**PROMOCODE: LET512**  
<del>$6.00</del> $4 per month  
**[Order Now - Detroit](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=9)**  
   
**VZ-1024**  
1GB Dedicated RAM  
512MB vSwap   
60GB Dedicated Storage    
1.5TB Bandwidth  
100Mbps connection  
2 IPv4 Address  
**PROMOCODE: LET1024**  
<del>$8.00</del> $5.00 per month   
**[Order Now - Detroit](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=10)**   
    
_Network Test_   
Test IPv4: 67.214.115.85  
Test IPv6: Not yet available  
Test File: http://67.214.115.85/100mb.test  
   
Our site is available at http://anynode.net along with AUP and TOS at http://anynode.net/aup and http://anynode.net/tos respectively. Billing is located at https://billing.anynode.net/. We accept payments in USD through PayPal.   
  
Our control panel was developed in-house. Currently only a limited frontend is available to customers, providing access to stop/start/reboot as well as reinstall and change the root password of their VPSes. A fully featured panel is still under development and will be announced in the future.    
  
anyNode is owned and operated by Active Solutions Group (http://activesolutionsmi.com), a registered Michigan corporation.
